00062 class API InducedVoltageFreq : public InducedVoltage {
00063 public:
00064     // Impedance sources inputed as a list (eg: list of BBResonators objects)*
00065     std::vector<Intensity *> fImpedanceSourceList;
00066 
00067     // *Input frequency resolution in [Hz], the beam profile sampling for the
00068     // spectrum
00069     // will be adapted according to the freq_res_option.*
00070     ftype fFreqResolutionInput;
00071 
00072     // Number of turns to be considered as memory for induced voltage
00073     // calculation.*

00078     // n_fft_sampling.*

00102 
00103     // Reprocess the impedance contributions with respect to the new_slicing.
00104     void reprocess();
